Name.label: Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with chronic hemolytic anemia
Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with another disease

TextSection.Contents: Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with chronic hemolytic anemia (PAH-CHA) is a form of PAH (see this term) characterized by an elevated pulmonary arterial resistance leading to right heart failure observed as a complication of chronic hemolytic anemia.

Synonym.label: PAH associated with chronic hemolytic anemia
